name: Top downgeon (prototype)
description:
The idea of the game was:

  • You can be almost any character
  • Enemies can be any character

(example: you can be a lvl20 blob and the enemy can be a Necromancer lvl 10 and still being a simple ai)

It's like a single player pvp game... but it's unfinished.

I'm working on it right now.

NOTES:

  • you can buy the asset pack with the pixel art characters that i used on this prototype ---> here <---
  • I'm developing the game ---> here <---
